fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm LCD upgrade message uses the node time zone
fields.request_details:
1. Run `python manage.py shell -c "from core.tasks import check_github_updates; check_github_updates()"` on the node to emit an upgrade notification.
2. Open the `locks/lcd_screen.lck` file under the node base directory or read the physical LCD.
3. Verify the second line shows `@ YYYYMMDD HH:MM` in the configured node time zone (America/Monterrey on gway-001) and not UTC.
4. Repeat after adjusting the system clock by one hour to ensure the timestamp tracks local time changes.
